bibl.title: Notes on Mural Painting in the Mareotis.
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte

bibl.note: A few characteristics of mural painting styles in the Mareotis from the late Roman and early Byzantine period.
WITTE-ORR Hanna, Notes on Mural Painting in the Mareotis.
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte 39 (2000) pp. 245-249 et pll. XXV-XXVII.
